name: Go Meet Your Friends
description:
«Why don’t you meet your friends» is a goal-free game about three friends, who met on a Friday night. You is back to the town and You wants to hang around with You’s buds after a long separation. What is their plan? Join them and figure it out. Feels like adventures await around every corner!

How to play:

Press A to walk

Use Mouse or Touchpad to rotate
